issue.title: Pending minor changes for 7.0

repository.name: efcore.pg
repository.description: Entity Framework Core provider for PostgreSQL

issue.body:
## Done

* [x] Unskip NorthwindBulkUpdatesNpgsqlTest.Update_with_cross_apply_set_constant (see https://github.com/npgsql/efcore.pg/pull/2475/files#r948507500)
* [x] Unskip Reverse_in_subquery_via_pushdown (https://github.com/dotnet/efcore/issues/27152)
* [x] Unskip Aggregate_over_subquery_in_group_by_projection (https://github.com/dotnet/efcore/issues/27278)
* [x] Unskip Average_Grouped_from_LINQ_101 (https://github.com/dotnet/efcore/issues/27155)

issue.title: Fix non-deterministic tests that fail on postgres

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

body:
@maumar this is still failing on PG, but this time because of rounding accuracy:

```
Expected: { Category = Condiments, AveragePrice = 22.308333 }
Actual:   { Category = Condiments, AveragePrice = 22.3083333333333333 }
```

... because the test implementation rounds on the expected side, presumably to match SQL Server behavior:

```c#
public virtual Task Average_Grouped_from_LINQ_101(bool async)
    => AssertQuery(
        async,
        ss => from p in ss.Set<ProductForLinq>()
              group p by p.Category
              into g
              select new { Category = g.Key, AveragePrice = g.Average(p => p.UnitPrice) },
        ss => from p in ss.Set<ProductForLinq>()
              group p by p.Category
              into g
              select new { Category = g.Key, AveragePrice = Math.Round(g.Average(p => p.UnitPrice) - 0.0000005m, 6) },
        elementSorter: e => (e.Category, e.AveragePrice));
```

I see that InMemory also overrides, probably because of this rounding - should we move the rounding to SQL Server rather than imposing it on all providers by default?

issue.title: Fix to #27155 - Average_Grouped_from_LINQ_101 is non-deterministic

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

issue.body:
Added custom asserter that checks results within range, rather than adding sql server specific expected query.
For the second test, added proper collection asserter so we can impose the order within nested collection.

Fixes #27155
